name: Simple Notion Notes Template
description: Tired of trying out different styles of note-taking on Notion, only to never use those notes again? Well, you no longer need to worry about having to search through a long page of notes.Complete with a table of contents and one-click buttons that populate each Topic and Section, you have easy to search notes as well as an index that fills up while you're taking your notes.Even though it's relatively simple, this is my most used template. I have consistently used it for almost three months now an
